disableKeyguard().name: disableKeyguard()
disableKeyguard().documentation:
Sets the value to be returned by {@link #isEnabled()} to false.

@see #isEnabled()

isEnabled().name: isEnabled()

reenableKeyguard().name: reenableKeyguard()
reenableKeyguard().documentation:
Sets the value to be returned by {@link #isEnabled()} to true.

@see #isEnabled()

name: org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowKeyguardManager.ShadowKeyguardLock
documentation: An implementation of {@link KeyguardManager#KeyguardLock}, for use in tests.
